verses.name: Job 20:1
verses.text: Then answered Zophar the Naamathite, and said,

verses.name: Job 20:2
verses.text: Therefore do my thoughts cause me to answer, and for this I make haste.

verses.name: Job 20:3
verses.text: I have heard the check of my reproach, and the spirit of my understanding causeth me to answer.

verses.name: Job 20:4
verses.text: Knowest thou not this of old, since man was placed upon earth,

verses.name: Job 20:5
verses.text: That the triumphing of the wicked is short, and the joy of the hypocrite but for a moment?

verses.name: Job 20:6
verses.text: Though his excellency mount up to the heavens, and his head reach unto the clouds;
